# PostgreSQL Prompts

Database design, optimization, and best practices for PostgreSQL.

## Prompt Library

| File | Description | Use When |
|------|-------------|----------|
| [optimization.md](optimization.md) | Query optimization and indexing | Performance tuning |
| [schema.md](schema.md) | Schema design patterns | Database design |
| [operations.md](operations.md) | Maintenance and operations | Database administration |

## Usage

```markdown
{{include:vendors/postgres/optimization.md}}
```

## Skills

- `postgres:analyze-query` - Analyze and optimize SQL query
- `postgres:design-schema` - Design database schema
- `postgres:audit` - Database performance audit
